name: Dave Ramsey Digital Envelope App
description: A full-featured budget management app implementing the popular envelope method for personal finance. Users can allocate funds across custom categories, track real-time spending, and manage month-to-month rollovers.

name: Chicago Bus Text-Multiplier
description: Stop relying on inaccurate bus arrival times. Integrates with the CTA API and Twilio to provide real-time multi-stop comparisons via SMS, using the only source that's consistently accurate — texting the bus stop number.

name: 60-Second Lesson
description: A micro-learning platform that delivers bite-sized lessons in under a minute. Each lesson is AI-generated based on trending topics and user interests, with spaced repetition to reinforce retention.

name: Month-Grid Habit Tracker
description: A minimalist habit tracker designed for iPhone lock screen widgets. See your entire month at a glance with a simple grid that fills in as you complete habits. Built natively with Swift and WidgetKit.

name: Research Assistant
description: Get opinions from multiple LLMs at one time for things that matter. Submit a single prompt and receive structured, side-by-side responses from GPT-4, Claude, and Gemini with source attribution.

name: PromptOS
description: An intelligence layer between a user and an LLM to optimize outcomes. Automatically rewrites prompts for clarity, manages context windows, and applies domain-specific templates.

name: Personal Brand Website
description: This very site — built with Next.js 16, Tailwind CSS 4, Firebase, and deployed on Google Cloud Run. Features an AI assistant, contact form, project showcase, and admin control center.
